si.title: செம்மணியில் சுண்டுக்குளி மாணவி கிருசாந்தி குமாரசுவாமி நினைவேந்தல்
body_lines: 1996 දී චුතුුකුළුලි කාන්තා උසස් පාසලේ 29 වන සංවත්සරය 1996 දී චන්ද්රිකා රජයේ පාලන තන්ත්රයේ දී ශ්රී ලංකා හමුදාව විසින් ශ්රී ලංකා හමුදාව විසින් and ාතනය කරන ලදී.

en.title: Chundukkuli student Krishna Kumaraswamy
body_lines: The 29th anniversary of the Chundukkuli Women's High School student who was arrested and subsequently assassinated by the Sri Lankan army in 1996 during the regime of the Chandrika government, Krisanthi Kumaraswamy's 29th anniversary event will be held on Sunday, 07.09.2025 at 9.00 am.
